title: [Tower Hill, East Obelisk]
description: A black basalt obelisk is imbedded in the hilltop and stands as a shadow against the night sky.  Just to the west, at the very crest of the hill, rises a circular tower of granite blocks.  Thick clusters of clover dot the grassy hillside and sprout along the faint path that descends around the hill to the south.

A black basalt obelisk is imbedded in the hilltop and stands out starkly against the pale sky.  Just to the west, at the very crest of the hill, rises a circular tower of granite blocks.  Thick clusters of clover dot the grassy hillside and sprout along the faint path that descends around the hill to the south.
